about_the_game:
Enjoy Ayumi’s world apart from visuals: with the Official X-Blades Soundtrack.
An acoustic experience of the action-packed adventure, with a total playing time of approx. 75 minutes including the amazing title song "Golden Despite".

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP SP 2/ Vista / 7 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: Intel/AMD Dual Core 1.5 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: with Shader 2.0 support and 128 MB RAM (Geforce FX 7+, ATI Radeon X2-series)
  • DirectX:9.0c
  • Hard Drive: 4 GB free hard disc space
  • Sound: DirectX 9.0c compatible
  • Misc: Keyboard, Mouse
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows XP SP 2/ Vista / 7 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: Intel/AMD Multicore CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: with Shader 3.0 support and 256 MB RAM
  • DirectX:9.0c
  • Hard Drive: 5 GB free hard disc space
  • Sound: DirectX 9.0c compatible
  • Misc: Keyboard, Mouse
